name: Fettuccine Alfredo with Mushrooms and Chicken
author: Hannahg
summary: This is one of my absolute favorite Alfredo dishes with mushrooms. My mom always used to make it, and I made it recently for some of my college friends and they were dying over it! It's very easy and, I have yet to meet a person who doesn't like this recipe!
ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
2  grilled chicken breasts, cubed, or more to taste
directions: Heat butter in a large pot over medium-high heat and add green onions and garlic
Cook until butter is simmering and onions and garlic are softened, 3 to 4 minutes
Add flour and stir for 1 minute
Stir in heavy cream, milk, Parmesan cheese, and mushrooms
Bring to a boil; reduce heat to medium-low and let simmer until sauce looks thick and creamy, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes
Meanwhile, fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil
Cook fettuccine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
Stir chicken into sauce mixture and heat through, 3 to 5 minutes, to avoid overcooking
